data_path.description: Path to the normalized csv dataset.

num_trees.description: Number of trees in the random forest. should be < 50

use_bootstrap.description: Whether to use bootstrap sampling for trees.

impurity_threshold.description: Threshold for impurity in decision trees.

use_validation.description: Whether to use a validation set for hyperparameter tuning.

cross_validation.description: Whether to use cross-validation for model evaluation.

min_split.description: disabled by default. enable to override min_split_range in training process

max_depth.description: disabled by default. enable to override max_depth_range in training process

unity_threshold.description: Threshold for unity in decision trees, disabled by default. enable to overwrite
unity_threshold.description_2: If the status is disabled, it will be automatically generated by the program.

combine_ratio.description: Ratio for combining results between oob_score and valid_score in training process.
combine_ratio.description_2: If the status is disabled, it will be automatically generated by the program.

train_flag.description: Training evaluation metrics to optimize during model training
train_flag.description_disabled: Automatic flag selection based on dataset characteristics (imbalance analysis)
train_flag.description_overwrite: User flags completely replace automatic detection
train_flag.description_stacked: User flags are combined with auto-detected flags using bitwise OR
